name: Jammed 2: Mission Jampossible
description:
Break into the jam factory and save the baby jams in the 2nd game in the Jammed series. Be careful, as some things aren't as they seem.

Team up with your fellow jams: Strawberry, Blueberry, Peanut Butter, Blackberry and Raspberry to save the jams. Each member of your team has a valuable and unique power. Solve puzzles and make your way through the factory.

This game was a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
